title: Job Relocating You to Atlanta?  Lease Purchase- Try Before You Buy!
posting_body: ['Contact me today to learn more about an innovative Lease with Right to Purchase program.', 'Unlike many rent to own programs or lease options, there is no obligation to buy and no', 'non-refundable option fees.', 'You actually get to choose the home you want from available homes on the market FOR SALE.', '***No down payment !!!', '*', "** Once you're approved and have chosen a home, all you need is just", '2 months refundable security deposit and 1st month lease payment.', 'Super Easy to Qualify:', '• Minimum annual household income of $50,000+', '• Minimum 620 TransUnion FICO score ( soft pull) and must have verifiable income.', '• No history of eviction or other landlord issues', '• No open bankruptcy', '• No disqualifying criminal history', 'For more information, call or text me today!', "I'd love to tell you more.", '<URL>', 'Contact:', 'Arthur Boyd', 'Associate Broker', 'Keller Williams Realty', 'Chattahoochee North', 'Mobile', 'show contact info', 'Office #', 'show contact info', '***Photo in the ad is for illustration purposes only!', '*', '**']
